pattern.opportunity: Formalize agent handoff protocol with explicit context passing between agents
pattern.proposed_change: Add structured handoff outputs: each agent returns a handoff schema with (1) work completed, (2) context for next agent, (3) validation criteria. This makes implicit handoffs explicit and enables human to see/redirect between agents.

raw_evidence.description: Session shows 4 agents invoked in sequence but handoff context is implicit in session state, not explicit in agent outputs. Human cannot easily verify what context was passed between agents.
raw_evidence.philosophy_gap: Violates 'makes implicit context explicit' inclusion criterion
